definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: fire-pot, brasier (ar. 0’ix= in Thes, is an error) alw. c. art. Je 36:22 [[לְפָנׇיו]] ´[[הַא]] [[מְבׂעָָרֶת]] the brasier before him was burning; v:Je 36:23 ´[[הָאֵשׁ אֲשֶׁר אֶל־הָא]]; v:Je 36:23 ´[[הָאֵשׁ אֲשֶׁר עַל־הָא]] (I. [[אָח]], brother v. sub [[אחה]]; III. [[אָח]] interj., p. 25).
